title: ssh: 951fbbb0a477 broke reading large stdout
body:
Using go tip and go.crypto{951fbbb0a477} the attached testcase gives truncated output.
The previous revision {7997ecacd006} gives the expected output

What is the expected output?
Read 2048 bytes

What do you see instead?
Read 1536 bytes

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux me 3.3.8-1.fc16.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Jun 4 20:49:02 UTC 2012 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64
GNU/Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
tip
Attachments: 1. short_buf.go (1073 bytes)
